data.title: Legacy
data.meta_description: The Stanford Prison Experiment was widely covered by the press immediately after its completion. Zimbardo gave dozens of interviews and testified before Congress; a 19-minute documentary was shot for NBC Chronolog two months after the Stanford Prison Experiment;...
